Panel Endorses Moderna’s Covid-19 VaccineThe panel’s recommendation moved a second vaccine closer to authorization, in a significant step toward expanding the reach of the U.S. vaccination effort.The formal emergency authorization, expected Friday, would clear the way for some 5.9 million doses to be shipped around the country starting this weekend.
Representative Cedric Richmond, a close Biden adviser, has tested positive for the coronavirus.
